changeSet.author: synchro
changeSet.sql: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "${synchro.schema}"."/SYN/DIEF_PI_REGISTRO_TIPO_70"( "MANDT" NVARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, "EMPRESA" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "FILIAL" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "CNPJ" NVARCHAR(16), "IE" NVARCHAR(18), "DT_DOC" NVARCHAR(8), "UF" NVARCHAR(3), "COD_MOD" NVARCHAR(2), "SER" NVARCHAR(4), "SUB" NVARCHAR(3), "NUM_DOC" NVARCHAR(6), "CFOP" NVARCHAR(4), "VL_DOC" DECIMAL(25,2), "VL_BC_ICMS" DECIMAL(25,2), "VL_ICMS" DECIMAL(25,2), "VL_NT" DECIMAL(25,2), "VL_OUT" DECIMAL(25,2), "IND_FRT" NVARCHAR(1), "COD_SIT" NVARCHAR(1), "DT_INI" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "DT_FIN" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL) UNLOAD PRIORITY 5 AUTO MERGE
